titleStmt.title: Kalōs proestōtes, or, A view of church-government wherein the proper church-governors are demonstrated, their office, duty, work and employment ... is declared ... : in a sermon preached at West-Malling ... Septemb. 16, 1662 / by John Stileman ...
titleStmt.author: Stileman, John, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Thomas Peirpont ...,

notesStmt.note: First two words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
